name: Dematerialize
description: You target a creature within a short (10 unit) distance and attempt to unravel their physical form. The target must make an endurance check of 10 or take 10 true damage. If this spell reduces a creature to 0 health, they are completely disintegrated, leaving no body behind.
charge: The damage increases to 20 true damage. Additionally, if the target rolls a 5 or less on their endurance check, they are instantly disintegrated regardless of their current health.
